details.description: Training for different business sectors is developed by sector skills councils. Search the Sector Skills Councils Alliance website for courses and qualifications.
details.more_information:
Courses are available in many business sectors, including:

  • retail motor industry
  • social care and young people
  • food and drink
  • science and industry
  • media
  • construction
  • environmental
  • health
  • creative
  • leisure
  • transport
  • tourism
  • law and policing
  • digital
  • freight
  • retail
  • finance
details.introduction: Find training and qualifications for your type of business on the Sector Skills Councils Alliance website.
details.will_continue_on: the Sector Skills Councils Alliance website

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
